# jira_user (Data Source)

Reads a user



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `query` (String) Name or Email of the user

### Read-Only

- `display_name` (String) display name
- `email_address` (String) email address
- `id` (String) ID
- `name` (String) name
- `self` (String) self
